translations.dialog.about.title: About {app_name} v{app_version}
translations.dialog.settings.title: Application Settings
translations.dialog.settings.gemini_tab.title: Google Gemini
translations.dialog.settings.custom_tab.title: Custom connections
translations.dialog.settings.gemini.api_keys_tooltip: List of API keys. One key will be used per request, in rotation.
translations.dialog.settings.gemini.fetch_models_tool: Connect to the API to get a list of available models.
translations.dialog.settings.gemini.get_details_toolt: Fetch detailed information for the currently selected Gemini model.
translations.dialog.settings.gemini.rpm_limit_info: Requests-Per-Minute (RPM) is a common rate limit. This sets the total number of requests the app will send per minute. Check official Gemini limits.
translations.dialog.settings.gemini.manual_control_in:
This allows you to set a fixed time delay between each API request, overriding the automatic delay calculated from the RPM limit.

Enable this if you are still hitting rate limits with the automatic setting.
translations.dialog.settings.gemini.warning_threshold: Sets the usage percentage at which the RPM status indicator will turn yellow to warn you that you are approaching the rate limit.
translations.dialog.settings.custom.table_header.name: Name
translations.dialog.settings.custom.remove_connection: Are you sure you want to remove the connection '{conn_name}'?
translations.dialog.settings.add_api_key.title: Add API Key
translations.dialog.settings.add_api_key.label: API Key:
translations.dialog.settings.fetch_models.error.gener: Could not fetch models with any provided keys.
translations.dialog.settings.model_details.error.no_k: Please add at least one Gemini API key to the list.
translations.dialog.settings.model_details.error.requ:
Could not get model details for '{clean_model_name}':

{error_details}
translations.dialog.settings.gemini.delay_warning: Warning: Delay is faster than safe value (~{safe_delay}s) for {rpm_limit} RPM.
translations.dialog.settings.language_tab.title: Language
translations.dialog.settings.language_tab.translation: Enables a floating toolbar to switch between original text, translation keys, and translated text. Useful for developers and translators.
translations.dialog.settings.language_tab.dev_tools_u: This feature requires the developer tools module (`developer_tools.py`), which was not found. This feature is disabled.
translations.dialog.provider_config.tooltip.sequentia:
If checked, the app will send requests one by one, waiting for each to complete.
This is recommended for APIs with strict concurrency limits.
translations.dialog.provider_config.button.reset_mode: Reset model-specific settings (limits, parsing, thinking) to default.
translations.dialog.provider_config.check.use_global_: Use global limits for this model
translations.dialog.provider_config.info_label.initia: Select a provider, then add and configure models.
translations.dialog.provider_config.tooltip.limits_pr: Profile: Uses the main rate limits of the connection.
translations.dialog.provider_config.tooltip.limits_cu: Custom: Uses specific limits for this model.
translations.dialog.provider_config.prompt.confirm_pr: Changing the provider will clear all currently configured models for this connection profile. Are you sure you want to continue?
translations.dialog.provider_config.prompt.remove_mod: Are you sure you want to remove the model '{model_id_to_remove}' from this profile?
translations.dialog.provider_config.prompt.reset_mode: Are you sure you want to reset all specific settings for model '{model_id}' to their defaults?
translations.dialog.provider_config.error.missing_inf: No model is selected in the table.
A Provider and Model ID are required.
API Key and Base URL are required to get live model info for cloud providers.
Connection details (Key, URL, Provider) and a Model ID are required to run the test.
translations.dialog.provider_config.limits_tooltip:
Global: Uses the main rate limits of the connection.
Custom: Uses specific limits for this model.
translations.dialog.provider_config.discovery.parsing: 'Thoughts' Parsing: Manual rules detected. - Start tag: {start_tag} - End tag: {end_tag} Apply these rules?
<u>'Thoughts' Parsing:</u> Could not be detected automatically.
translations.dialog.provider_config.error.discovery_f: An error occurred during the test: {error_message}
translations.dialog.provider_config.warning.missing_i: API Key and Base URL are required.
translations.dialog.provider_config.info.error.model_: Model '{model_name}' not found via this connection's API.
Model '{model_name}' not found in the downloaded registry.
translations.dialog.provider_config.info.error.could_: Could not load models.dev registry from cache or network.
translations.dialog.provider_config.info.message.no_s: No static data found in LiteLLM's DB.
translations.dialog.provider_config.tooltip.base_url_: This is a default URL. Double-click to enable editing.
translations.dialog.additional_params.title: Additional Parameters
translations.dialog.additional_params.group.include_b: Parameters to be included in the Chat Completion request body (YAML object)
translations.dialog.additional_params.group.exclude_b: Parameters to be excluded from the Chat Completion request body (YAML array)
translations.dialog.additional_params.group.include_h: Additional headers for Chat Completion requests (YAML object)
translations.dialog.wip.title: Feature Under Development
translations.dialog.wip.text.model_info:
The model information display is currently being improved. For now, it shows the raw JSON data retrieved from the APIs.

A user-friendly interface for this feature will be available in a future update.
translations.dialog.wip.text.startup: This update has been long overdue. The core functionality is complete, but as for the secondary features... some are finished but may have bugs, some don't work as intended, and some are simply broken. They will be addressed in future updates.
translations.dialog.update.text: A new version is available for **{component_name}**: **{new_version}**
translations.dialog.update.info.recommended: It is recommended to perform the update.
translations.dialog.update.info.critical_warning: Skipping this update is strongly discouraged.
translations.dialog.update.failed.title: Automatic Update Failed
translations.dialog.update.failed.text: Could not start the automatic updater due to an error.
translations.dialog.update.failed.info:
Please update manually from the project's GitHub page.

Error: {e}
translations.dialog.update.core_required.title: Core Update Required
translations.dialog.update.core_required.text: The new version of {app_name} requires a core version of {min_core_version} or higher.
translations.dialog.donation.title: Support Development
translations.dialog.donation.text:
Looks like you're actively using the program! That's great.

If it helps you, please consider supporting its continued development. This motivates me to add new features.

translations.dialog.manage_languages.error.cannot_rem: At least one source language must remain.
